oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriting Session - Joe Doyle and Roger D. Ferris - 2018-07-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by songwriters Joe Doyle and Roger D. Ferris from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 21, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Doyle; Roger D. Ferris;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00 Walk-in music / (01:17) Opening comments and songwriters introduction / (04:14) Opening comments by Joe / (04:38) Introduction and performance of She Said Yes (Joe Doyle-piano) / (06:33) Opening comments by Roger / (07:24) Introduction of the next song / (08:45) Performs Some Ole Side Road (Roger-guitar) / (11:19) Joe talks asks the audience where they're from / (12:00) Introduces the next song / (13:41) Performs Back In This Cigarette / (16:14) Roger talks about coming to Nashville / (16:50) Introduces the next song / (18:04) Performs So Many People (Randy) / (21:04) Joe tells story about his dog / (21:38) Joe introduces the next song / (23:24) Performs Back To Bethlehem (Joe) / (27:20) Question about writing specifically for certain artists or song publishers shopping their songs / (30:36) Question about writing lyrics or music first / (33:30) Roger introduces the next song / (35:47) Performs The King Is Gone (So Are You) (Roger) / (39:12) Joe introduces the next song / (40:26) Performs In Pictures / (42:08) Final comments / (42:43) Walk-out music / (43:37) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Doyle, Joe; Ferris, Roger D.; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
